dmca.title: [AB-C32124V] Cease and Desist on dougwestexposed.com
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page dougwestexposed.com any of the
material that you claim is being infringed as of 12:04:32 a.m. (GMT-6).

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com 

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Posted At: Saturday, June 24, 2006 10:25 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [AB-C32124V] Cease and Desist on dougwestexposed.com
Subject: [AB-C32124V] Cease and Desist on dougwestexposed.com


Reference: [AB-C32124V]

For your review. 

Thank you, 

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc. 
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

==== Original Message ====
1. Cease and Desist on dougwestexposed.com Added by system at Saturday,
Jun 24 2006 01:10 am

a34-mta02.direcway.com  (iPlanet Messaging Server 5.2 HotFix 1.25 (built
Mar  3 2004))  with ESMTP id <0J1C00HOSP4RI6@a34-mta02.direcway.com> for
abuse@THEPLANET.COM;  Sat, 24 Jun 2006 02:10:10 -0400 (EDT)
Date: Sat, 24 Jun 2006 01:09:57 -0500
From: Doug West <Doug@kosoma.com>
Subject: Cease and Desist on dougwestexposed.com
To: abuse@THEPLANET.COM
Cc: pphilippi@corporatelegalservices.org
Message-id: <449CD735.A2AA1AD6@kosoma.com>
Organization: Kosoma Publishing
MIME-version: 1.0
X-Mailer: Mozilla 4.7 [en]C-CCK-MCD NSCPCD47  (WinNT; I)
Content-type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-transfer-encoding: 7BIT
X-Accept-Language: en
Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 66.82.4.91 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of kosoma.com) client-ip=66.82.4.91;
envelope-from=Doug@kosoma.com; helo=a34-mta02.direcway.com; 

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sirs, 
 
It has come to our attention that one of your hosting customers has
pirated images from our site. They have also violated a Non-Disclosure
statement on taking our Day Trading course and have out and out
slandered us on their site, namely: 
 
dougwestexposed.com 
 
It is our understanding that you provide the ISP for the name servers on
this domain. One glance at the above site and you can see that it is a
purely hateful and vengeful site. 
 
The main image he has pirated can be seen on our site at: 
 
http://oiopro.com/images/WestDoug_150w.jpg
(he may now have taken this image down) 
 
See our terms of use page at: 
 
http://oiopro.com/tou.html 
 
You can view our Affiliate & Student Agrement at: 
 
http://oiopro.com/RepAgreement.html 
 
We ask that you pull the plug on this site ASAP. Our attorneys will be
in touch soon, but the sooner we get this guy shut down the better. He
has fabricated statements from fictional persons who have never even
taken our course. He has also slandered our affiliates. 
 
His alterior motive is that he is selling an ebook of the things he
learned in our trading class. We are considering a libel suit against
Mr. Jody McConkey, and don't really have an interest in pulling in the
hosting company, ISP, registrar, etc. but will if we have too. 
 
There is also the matter of copyright violations and several other laws
that have been broken by your him. 
 
The administrative contact is: 
 
Administrative Contact: contactprivacy.com,
dougwestexposed.com@contactprivacy.com
96 Mowat Ave Toronto, ON M6K 3M1
CA +1.4165385457 
 
The owner no doubt is: 
 
Jody McConkey
5339 Stamford St
Niagara Falls, Ontario
Canada L2E 1N4
905-592-1137 
 
Although he may be operating out of one of several aliases. 
 
We also found this info on him: 
 
Registrant Contact: Limestone Data Services J. McConkey
**********@limestonedata.com)  
+1.9058539420
Fax: +1.9058539107
601 Gorham St. Newmarket, S L3Y 1L1 CA 
 
Limestone Data is apparently his company. 
 
Under penalty of perjury, the undersigned supply this information and
agree that it is accurate. 
 
We look forward to your early reply on this matter. 
 
Sincerely, 
 
Doug West
Kosoma Publishing
HWY 2 North
Box 89
Moyers, Oklahoma 74557
580 298-2778
